name: tekton-tasks-web-component
description: A web component for viewing and triggering Tekton tasks in Facets Control Plane

scripts.dev: npm run build && python3 -m http.server 8080 --directory public
scripts.build: npm run copy-files && npm run bundle
scripts.copy-files: cp src/tekton-tasks.js public/ && cp src/styles/main.css public/
scripts.bundle: echo 'Build complete - files copied to public/'
